supportDesc.support: Fragments 1-17 (in mm), (1) 32 x 20, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (2) 52 x 45, (A) 45 lines, no margins, (B) 4 lines, left margin, (3) 57 x 22, (A) 8 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (4) 54 x 34, (A) 1 line, top margin, (B) traces, (5) 41 x 27, (A) 5 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (6) 21 x 16, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) 3 lines, no margins, (7) 22 x 9, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (8) 23 x 14, (A) 4 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (9) 22 x 16, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) 2 lines, no margins, (10) 30 x 21, (A) 4 lines, top margin, right bent over, (B) blank, (11) 33 x 21, (A) 4 lines, top margin, (B) blank, (12) 32 x 28, (A) 3 lines, no margins, (B) blank, (13) 85 x 28, (A) 4 lines, right bottom margins, (B) blank, (14) 80 x 34, (A) 2 lines, bottom right margins, (B) blank, (15) 70 x 26, (A) 9 lines, left margin, (B) blank, (16) 69 x 27, (A) 6 lines, right margin, (B) 4 lines, no margins, (17) 60 x 27, (A) 4 lines, top (?) margin, (B) traces
